H0.text: In relation to phobias what word describes the fear of strangers or foreigners. Allotriophobia

H1.text: In relation to phobias what word describes the fear of strangers or foreigners. Heterophobia

H2.text: In relation to phobias what word describes the fear of strangers or foreigners. Xenophobia-like term 'Xenoglossophobia'

H3.text: In relation to phobias what word describes the fear of strangers or foreigners. Xenophoby

A4.text: Xenophobia (from Ancient Greek ξένος (xénos) 'strange, foreign, or alien' and φόβος (phóbos) 'fear') is the fear or dislike of anything that is perceived as being foreign or strange.

A5.text: Xenophobia – Irrational fear or hatred of foreigners, strangers or the unknown, sometimes used to describe anti-immigration nationalistic political beliefs and movements

A6.text: Xenophobia – Irrational fear or hatred of foreigners, strangers or the unknown

A7.text: Heterophobia is defined as the fear, aversion, avoidance, or discrimination against heterosexual individuals.

A8.text: Foreign language anxiety, also known as xenoglossophobia, is the feeling of unease, worry, nervousness and apprehension experienced in learning or using a second or foreign language.
